items.sentence: Aren\'t you the one who told Tom to do that?
Aren\'t you worried about what might happen?
As I told you before, Tom can\'t be trusted.
I might have some information that you need.
I think I should stay and help you clean up.
Tom didn\'t have to go to Boston by himself.
Tom didn\'t have to wait for us, but he did.
Tom didn\'t hesitate to tell Mary the truth.
I\'ve recently changed brands of toothpaste.
I\'ve wanted to ask you out for a long time.
Tom didn\'t even answer one of my questions.
I didn\'t know you were born in Boston, too.
Tom will be asleep by the time we get there.
Pay Tom back the thirty dollars you owe him.
Do you want to be a bartender all your life?
Do you want to come over for dinner tonight?
We\'ve finally hired someone to replace Tom.
I can\'t believe Tom is already a sophomore.
I\'ve eaten nothing for the past three days.
Last night, Tom went to bed before midnight.
Let me give you something to remember me by.
I think that Tom was about ready to do that.
Tom became a French teacher three years ago.
I want the recipe for this. It\'s delicious.
Could you give us just a few minutes longer?
Could you please show me your boarding pass?
I\'m going to give you just one more chance.
How long does Tom expect us to wait for him?
Don\'t argue with a woman when she\'s tired.
Tom is just a farm boy living in a big city.
Tom is just not the person I thought he was.
Tom is likely to be chosen for the position.
Tom is likely to be tired when he gets home.
Tom is looking forward to seeing Mary again.
Your blood pressure may go up in the winter.
Suppose Tom wasn\'t really going to do that.
Tom found out that Mary was a married woman.
Tom gave Mary a hug and a kiss on the cheek.
I love you and think about you all the time.
I think you could\'ve done this by yourself.
Tom wants to know what he\'s supposed to do.
The person who stabbed Tom was never caught.
The police interrogated Tom for three hours.
I didn\'t know where to put Tom\'s suitcase.
My mother was the one that taught me French.
I\'m not going to go to Boston next weekend.
Tom isn\'t old enough to do that on his own.
Tom isn\'t the only one who need to do that.
Tom knew he didn\'t have to do that anymore.
Tom knew that something was on Mary\'s mind.
I did what most people do in that situation.
Please help yourselves to anything you like.
Please tell me exactly what you really want.
You\'re taking advantage of Tom\'s weakness.
Tom didn\'t tell us that he was from Boston.
Tom said he wanted to go to business school.
Tom said he wanted to learn how to windsurf.
Tom said he wanted to see us before we left.
Tom said he wanted to take an afternoon nap.
I\'m trying to figure out what I have to do.
Tom didn\'t realize Mary shouldn\'t do that.
Tom didn\'t want to answer Mary\'s question.
Both Tom and Mary didn\'t do that yesterday.
Tom is looking for someone who knows French.
Tom is never going to find out who did that.
Tom is sitting in the corner all by himself.
Tom collected some pine cones in the forest.
Tom complained it was too hot in the office.
Tom stole a truck from his neighbor\'s farm.
Tom thinks he\'s smarter than everyone else.
Tom admitted that he wasn\'t really psychic.
Tom didn\'t seem to want to know about that.
Tom didn\'t show up at the party last night.
Tom didn\'t sign the confession voluntarily.
Tom didn\'t speak at all during the meeting.
Have any of your friends ever been arrested?
Have you finished doing what you were doing?
I think it\'s unlikely Tom will get elected.
I think we shouldn\'t let Tom do that again.
You should\'ve seen the look on Tom\'s face.
How did Tom know where Mary was going to be?
Tom and only Tom really knows what happened.
Tom appears to be concerned about something.
Tom discovered a flaw in the ship\'s design.
Wouldn\'t it be nice if Tom quit doing that?
Tom didn\'t know he didn\'t have to do that.
Tom didn\'t know how long he\'d been asleep.
This is completely normal where I come from.
I\'m sorry for everything I\'ve done to you.
I think that\'s not what we should be doing.
I know that something horrible has happened.
I know very few people who can speak French.
I know where Tom keeps his important papers.
I\'m sorry, I didn\'t know where else to go.
I\'m sorry, but I\'m already dating someone.
Tom knew what Mary said she was going to do.
Tom knows how to deal with people like that.
What makes you think I wouldn\'t enjoy that?
Is it true Tom is one of your close friends?
I\'m going to ask them where they\'re going.
